data.persona: I wonder how much I can get for this roll of silk?  Is that street urchin going to swipe a leg of meat again?  It's a beautiful day to be out selling my wares in the town market.
data.description:
You are in the Kebab stall.
A long wooden table covered with a clothe awning that extends to the customer area. People are crowding the front of it. select meats and trimmings are on display, but most of the supplies are stored in the back. There is a small fire with a slice of meat spitted and roasting in the back left of the vendor.  Garlic, and other herbs are hanging from the posts holding up the awning.
The merchant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the vendor's gold stash to get out of town.
data.mid_motivation: I need to escape the local law enforcement by blending in with a group of other merchants passing through town.
data.long_motivation: I need to relocate to a new kingdom and assume a new identity.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get my knife from my trunk at home.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield knife and threaten the merchant. Demand all the gold he collected that day.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put my knife  on the merchant's back and force him to show me where he lives.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: steal a month's worth of gold profits from the merchant at the merchant's home and narrowly escape.
